messages.subject: Fwd: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: Need for advice
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 03/22/2000 10:05:14 PM Pacific Standard Time, Natrlmama@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 03/22/2000 10:05:14 PM Pacific Standard Time,
Natrlmama@... writes:

<< Whats really cool is that my dd tells
people that we don't need to go to school to learn things, we just learn
from going places and doing things. Good luck!
Kathy >>

I had to laugh as your post brought back a precious memory from my dd.
She spent hours in our small pond, catching newts, frog eggs, and whatever she
could find. Our back porch shelf was lined with jars and jars of her
discoveries.
Her remark was "I don't need to go to school, I have a pond!".

Now I have a 10 year old who is also a nature girl.

Bonnie
